snippet.title: Hazard Story Time with Conor McLeod | Overwatch 2
snippet.description:
To build a better world, you have to tear the old one down first.

Join Conor McLeod, the voice actor behind Hazard, for a reading of our newest comic, ‘Tear It Down.’

See what life was like for Hazard as he tried to make it in a broken world, and how everything changed when he found his true calling with the Phreaks.

Learn more about Hazard during his limited-time trial Nov 22-25 and when he officially arrives in Season 14.

Read by Conor McLeod as Hazard
Written by Fred Kennedy
Art & Cover by Hannah Templer
Letters by AndWorld Design

Senior Director, Story & Franchise Development: Venecia Duran
Senior Manager, Writing & Books: Matthew Cohan
Editorial Supervisor: Chloe Fraboni
Senior Brand Artist: Corey Peterschmidt

Production:
Brianne Messina
Amber Proue-Thibodeau
Takayuki Shimbo
Laura Woodward

Game Team Consultation:
Jeff Chamberlain
Nesskain
Dion Rogers
Jude Stacey

Special Thanks:
Angel Giuffria

Overwatch 2 is free to play for everyone on console & PC!
_
Follow #Overwatch2 for the latest news:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoverwatch
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@overwatch
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch
